books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The defense lawyer Mickey Haller represents a woman facing home foreclosure who is accused of killing a banker.
books.name: THE FIFTH WITNESS

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Routinely doing business from his Lincoln Town Cars, the bottom-feeding attorney Mickey Haller is asked to defend the scion of a wealthy family who might not be guilty of a murderous crime.
books.name: THE LINCOLN LAWYER

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: A woman haunted by the disappearance of her young son discovers that someone has stolen her identity.
books.name: I’LL WALK ALONE

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Jean M. Auel
books.description: The latest volume in a series that began with “The Clan of the Cave Bear,” set during the ice age.
books.name: THE LAND OF PAINTED CAVES

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The owner of a Greenwich Village town house takes in boarders and bonds with her tenants.
books.name: 44 CHARLES STREET

books.author: by Lora Leigh
books.description: The Breeds said no harm would come to Mica Toler, but they never allowed for her fascination with the wolf breed Navarro Blaine.
books.name: NAVARRO'S PROMISE

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The Los Angeles psychologist-detective Alex Delaware and the detective Milo Sturgis work on a grisly homicide case.
books.name: MYSTERY

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: The third volume of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Myron Bolitar’s search for a missing rock star leads to questions about his own missing brother.
books.name: LIVE WIRE

books.author: by Paula McLain
books.description: Ernest Hemingway’s first wife, Hadley, narrates this novel set in Paris.
books.name: THE PARIS WIFE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: Picoult takes on the issue of gay rights in this novel about a music therapist who desperately wants a child.
books.name: SING YOU HOME

books.author: by James Patterson and Neil McMahon
books.description: Hays Baker, a top operative for the Agency of Change and a national hero, suddenly finds himself a hunted fugitive who must fight to save humans from extinction.
books.name: TOYS

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: Detective D. D. Warren must solve the case of a dead husband, a battered wife and a missing child.
books.name: LOVE YOU MORE
